page.title: 11THE MAY FAIR
page.content: There is a May Fair every year, one at Petherton recreation ground and one in the village of Over Stratton, in someones garden (it's a very big garden). What a May Fair is, is stalls and on the stalls are cakes and there's a 'bring & buy'which is mainly vegetables and fruit. There is a treasure hunt stall which is grass and soil and a bit of water and you have a little white flag on which they put your name. Then you have to put it where you think the treasure would be. There is a sack full of hay with things in and you had to put your hand in and take something out and see what you have got,it is really called the lucky dip. There is a metal thing that you had to try and get round. If you touched it this little bell would ring. There is also a coconut shie, a roundabout and a raffle.
